restrictions: Breaking changes require deprecation period (2 versions minimum)
New versions must include upgrade path for existing installations
API changes must maintain backwards compatibility
Major version bumps (1.x.x to 2.0.0) require explicit user approval

migration_notes: 1.8.0: Testing gap remediation - 8-layer defense-in-depth system prevents application layer bugs. E2E test infrastructure (3 templates: CLI subprocess execution with DB validation, Web service with HTTP requests, Library installation). Test data generators (6 types: audio WAV with sine waves, SQLite databases, CSV, JSON, text, images - no mocks). UAT executor runs actual user commands. Schema-contract validator detects DB/API mismatches. Runtime validation decorators (@validate_schema) catch missing fields at persistence. Phase 5 Gate enforces E2E tests for CLI/Web (100% pass rate required). Comprehensive docs (E2E-TESTING-GUIDE.md, TEST-LEVEL-REQUIREMENTS.md). Would have caught file_hash bug at 3+ points. Based on FailureAssessment/TESTING_GAP_ANALYSIS.md. Adds 2,915+ lines across 12 files.

1.7.2: Component naming convention enforcement - Comprehensive 6-layer enforcement system (documentation, prevention, detection, migration, auto-fix, pre-commit hooks). Universal pattern ^[a-z][a-z0-9_]* works across all languages. Multi-language migration system (Python, JS/TS, Rust, Go, C++, Java). Configuration-driven auto-fix policies. Includes 37 new files, 55+ tests, 550+ line user guide.
1.7.1: Critical installation fixes - Added VERSION file to SYSTEM_MANIFEST.json, improved system file synchronization, enhanced upgrade reliability
1.7.0: Orchestrate command consolidation - Merged /orchestrate-full into /orchestrate with --level flag. Added --help, --resume capabilities. Single command architecture (industry standard).

1.5.0: Template library expansion + hybrid feature extraction - Adds 40 feature templates (GUI/PySide6, AI/LLM, Audio, Scientific, CLI, Data, Testing, Deployment/Podman). Implements hybrid extraction (automated + LLM supplementation via /extract-features command). Removes version field from project-metadata.json (VERSION file is single source of truth).
1.0.0: STABLE RELEASE - Production deployment. Breaking changes now require deprecation. All future updates MUST include upgrade capability for existing installations. Upgrade scripts mandatory.

0.17.0: Gate enforcement system - Multi-layered defense (documentation + technical + process) prevents premature completion. Adds enforced wrapper, state tracking, evidence-based reports. Solves 'Looks Good But Breaks' pattern from Music Analyzer v1-v3 failures
0.16.0: Multi-language distribution support - Extends Checks 14-16 to JavaScript/TypeScript, Go, Rust via plugin architecture
0.15.0: Distribution-first redesign - Adds Checks 14-16, package structure standard, prevents hardcoded path failures
0.14.0: Programmatic enforcement via phase gates - Prevents premature stopping
0.13.0: Feature coverage testing - ALL declared features must be tested
0.12.0: README accuracy testing - Documentation examples validated
0.2.0: Removed MCP architecture, replaced with Task tool for parallel execution - BREAKING CHANGE
